WorkItem.Description: Instead of SQL CE, I am using SQL Server 2008. but the values are not getting inserted after tables have been created. later I found out that values for Id properties of Genre, Artist and Album are not given in the sample data file. It worked once i added values for Id properties. Let me know if anyone else faced this issue.
WorkItem.Summary: Sample Data File is missing values for Id properties

Comments.Message: I got this error couple of times, but could not recreate this always. Id column was not created as identity column for the first time. what could be the issue?
